chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: An Explosion for This Chuunibyo! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma, determined to live the adventurer life, declared his first course of action must be a quest. And so the pair set off...

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: An Explosion for This Chuunibyo! - P2
summary_text: Battling giant toads was too foolhardy an endeavor for the party in its current state. It was time to recruit new members at the guild.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Panty Treasure in This Right Hand! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma's faith in his party had reached a new low. It was then that a thief named Chris appeared, culminating in the two battling in an unusual competition.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Panty Treasure in This Right Hand! - P2
summary_text: An urgent quest had been issued to defend Axel against the incoming storm of cabbage. Darkness bravely answered the call, shielding her friends as best she could.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: Explosion Magic for This Powerful Enemy! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma had taken it upon himself to help Megumin with her daily Explosion practice. They headed for a hill, topped with an abandoned castle.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: Explosion Magic for This Powerful Enemy! - P2
summary_text: The Devil King Army Commander Verdia had mounted a ferocious assault on Axel. Surely there was a reason for the warlord's fury...

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Price for This Magic Sword! - P1
summary_text: The party had taken on a quest to purify a lake. A simple enough task, save for the one complication of the horde of gargantuan alligators living there.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Price for This Magic Sword! - P2
summary_text: With their quest concluded, our heroes returned to town and came upon the wielder of the cursed sword, Gram. Oddly enough, this gallant knight seemed to know Aqua.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Conclusion to This Worthless Fight! - P1
summary_text: Verdia, the Devil King Army Commander, returned to attack the town once again. The gang dug in their heels alongside an army of adventurers, ready for the final showdown.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Conclusion to This Worthless Fight! - P2
summary_text: Though Verdia enjoyed the upper hand from the start, it came to light that his weakness was water! And so, Kazuma's party looked to turn the tables.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Second Death in This Freezing Season! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma and friends took on a quest to clear out snow sprites. This would be an easy payday, or so it seemed...until the Winter Shogun appeared.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Second Death in This Freezing Season! - P2
summary_text: The Winter Shogun had dealt our hero a second untimely death. A pouting Kazuma refused to be revived, against the pleas of his party.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Loving Hand for Our Party in Winter! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma and Aqua paid a visit to Wiz's shop, where the goddess displayed unabashed disdain for the timid lich.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Loving Hand for Our Party in Winter! - P2
summary_text: Tasked with exorcising a ghost-ridden mansion, our heroes were kept on the run well into the night by a horde of unquiet spirits.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful Shop! - P1
summary_text: Word of a "special" dream service reached Kazuma by way of Dust and Keith. Thoroughly enticed, our hero set foot in the back-alley succubus shop for the very first time.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful Shop! - P2
summary_text: His order placed, our hero returned home. While enjoying his evening bath, Kazuma looked forward to a night like no other. It was then that Darkness entered...

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Final Flame for This Ridiculous Fortress! - P1
summary_text: The rampaging Destroyer had Axel dead in its sights. Would Kazuma and his allies be able to repel this unprecedented threat and save their beloved town?

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
title_text: A Final Flame for This Ridiculous Fortress! - P2
summary_text: As the battle against the Destroyer neared its climax, Kazuma concocted a plan to teleport the machine's explosive core far, far away.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: Deliver Me from This Judicial Injustice! - P1
summary_text: Enter the royal prosecutor, Sena. She claimed the damage to the kingdom incurred in the Destroyer battle was Kazuma's fault...and an act of treason, no less!

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: Deliver Me from This Judicial Injustice! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma appeared in court, hoping to clear his name. Would our hero manage to escape the death penalty?

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: A Friend for This Crimson Demon Girl! - P1
summary_text: Tasked with culling giant toads emerging from hibernation, the party found themselves in an uphill battle. Luckily, help arrived...

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: A Friend for This Crimson Demon Girl! - P2
summary_text: Megumin entered Wiz's shop to browse the items, only to receive an abrupt challenge from her old friend, Yunyun.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: Peace for the Master of This Labyrinth! - P1
summary_text: The party was flat broke. Forced to take drastic action, Kazuma accepted a quest to explore Keele's Dungeon.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: Peace for the Master of This Labyrinth! - P2
summary_text: The hidden room was occupied by Keele, a lich. After the undead explained his story, he asked Kazuma for a favor.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: A Betrothed for This Noble Daughter! - P1
summary_text: Forced into marriage talks with another noble, Darkness enlisted Kazuma's help to sabotage the arrangement.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: A Betrothed for This Noble Daughter! - P2
summary_text: With the possibility of freeing the party from Darkness's strange quirks, Kazuma attempted to ensure the marriage proposal's success.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: Servitude for This Masked Knight! - P1
summary_text: At Sena's behest, Kazuma and party found themselves returning to a dungeon newly-inhabited by a masked maker of earthen dolls.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: Servitude for This Masked Knight! - P2
summary_text: Darkness was now a pawn of the evil Vanir. Would our heroes be able to rescue their beloved crusader from his influence?

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: Goodbye to This Irritating Living World! - P1
summary_text: On Kazuma's request, the party stopped by the Axel blacksmith. Apparently, the former shut-in had commissioned a very special weapon.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: Goodbye to This Irritating Living World! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma and the gang set out on a new quest. Their mission: face a herd of lizard runners in heated battle.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: An Invitation for This Knucklehead! - P1
summary_text: A business deal with Vanir landed Kazuma wealth beyond his dreams...and also a spiral into slothful decadence. Luckily, Megumin had a plan to save him.

chapter_title_text: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! - Season 2
title_text: An Invitation for This Knucklehead! - P2
summary_text: While en route to Arcanretia, Kazuma and friends found themselves staring down a horde of running hawk kites. The adventurers prepared for battle.
